Protocols/CardContainerDataSource.html#/.name: numberOfCards(for:)
Protocols/CardContainerDataSource.html#/.abstract: Return the number of cards in CardContainerView

Protocols/CardContainerDataSource.html#/.name: cardContainerView(_:imageForCardAt:)
Protocols/CardContainerDataSource.html#/.abstract: Return relative image at the specified location.

Protocols/CardContainerDataSource.html.name: CardContainerDataSource
Protocols/CardContainerDataSource.html.abstract: The object adopt this protocol will provide a CardContainerView with card number and relative image.

Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.name: enableBrightnessControl
Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.abstract: A Boolean value deciding whether control brightness on different cards. The default value is true.

Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.name: maxVisibleCardCount
Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.abstract: The max number of visible cards in the view. The default value is 10.

Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.name: needsBorder
Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.abstract: A Boolean value deciding whether provide a border on every card view. The default value is true.

Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.name: cardSize
Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.abstract: The size of the first card you see. If you change this value, call layoutCardsIfNeeded() to resize cards.

Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.name: cardBackColor
Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.abstract: Color of card’s back. If it’s nil, card back is black. The default value is nil.

Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.name: cardBorderWidth
Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.abstract: The border width of the first card you see. The default value is 5.

Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.name: maxYOffsetBetweenCards
Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.abstract: Specify max distance(points) between cards in vertical direction. The default value is 35.

Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.name: minYOffsetBetweenCards
Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.abstract: Specify min distance(points) between cards in vertical direction. The default value is 15.

Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.name: dataSource
Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.abstract: The data source must adopt the CardContainerDataSource protocol. The data source is not retained.

Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.name: headCardIndexAtDataSource
Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.abstract: Head card’s location in data source. If data source is nil or empty, returns nil.

Classes/CardContainerView.html#/c:@M@Car.name: init(frame:)
Classes/CardContainerView.html#/c:@M@Car.abstract: Init a CardContainerView with specified frame and default card size.

Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.name: init(frame:cardSize:)
Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.abstract: Init a CardContainerView with specified frame and card size.

Classes/CardContainerView.html#/c:@M@Car.name: init(coder:)
Classes/CardContainerView.html#/c:@M@Car.abstract: Init from storyboard/xib file. Card size is default value: (400, 300).

Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.name: slideDown()
Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.abstract: Slide down the head card. This method is safe.

Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.name: slideUp()
Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.abstract: Slide up a card to be the head card. The method is safe.

Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.name: insertCard(at:)
Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.abstract: Insert a cark at specified location. You must update data source before calling this method.

Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.name: removeCard(at:)
Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.abstract: Remove card at specified location. You muust update data source before calling this method.

Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.name: layoutCardsIfNeeded()
Classes/CardContainerView.html#/s:13Card.abstract: Lay out all cards immediately. If you change cardSize, call this method to resize cards.

Classes/CardContainerView.html.name: CardContainerView
Classes/CardContainerView.html.abstract: A view to display images like cards, support pan gesture to slide up and down.
